programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenage girl's death in a hit-and-run accident leads Benson and Stabler to a human trafficking ring; Cragen becomes frustrated by his crumbling precinct.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Benson and Stabler investigate a young woman's rape and murder, the case puts them in the line of fire and exposes a larger mystery that includes more victims.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler notices that Benson is bonding with Calvin, the boy left in her care; Fin and Munch must investigate when the name of Calvin's mother (Maria Bello) comes up during a rape investigation.
Emergency response providers put their lives at risk to save others.
A night at an amusement park takes a deadly turn when a roller coaster malfunction leaves lives hanging in the balance; Abby reaches out to Buck; Athena and Hen respond to an unusual home invasion.

Bobby and his team respond to an emergency at a children's birthday party; the crew jumps into action after one of their own is involved in a devastating accident; Athena tries to cope with a tragedy that hits way too close to home.

Bobby and the team race to help the survivors of a deadly plane crash; Athena deals with chaos at the airport; Bobby confronts his past demons; Athena is out for revenge against teen bullies; Abby delivers an important message from a 9-1-1 caller.

The crew races to an emergency at an Indian wedding; Abby enlists Buck to help her find her mother; Abby meets Athena for the first time; Bobby confronts his past; Hen struggles to make the right decision.

On Valentine's Day, a surprise marriage proposal goes awry with dangerous consequences; Athena attempts to help a desperate woman; Bobby and Chimney pull holiday duty; Abby and Buck go on their first official date.

A full moon keeps the crew busy with crazy calls; Athena investigates a potential home invasion; Abby helps investigate a caller's murder; Bobby and Buck have their hands full at a yoga studio for pregnant women; Hen's past may become her future.
Bobby gets a surprising phone call from his doctor after donating at Chimney's blood drive; Athena confronts Michael after having a heart-to-heart with their kids.

programme.desc: Discussion and analysis of Premier League soccer.

programme.desc: Fresh out of law school, Rudy Baylor confronts Leo F. Drummond in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The case of Johnny Hincapie, whose conviction for the 1990 murder of a Utah tourist in New York -- a case that represented a tipping point in the city's law enforcement -- was overturned after 25 years.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: After a young Army veteran disappears, detectives uncover a cryptic 911 call placed 11 days before she went missing, which exposes a twisted story -- and the truth.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A wife and mother survives an attack in her home and a shot to the head; authorities search for a motive.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A wife and mother survives an attack in her home and a shot to the head; authorities search for a motive.

When the Hollywood Reservoir dam breaks, Bobby and the 118 race into action to save passengers on a city bus that has crashed into a building several stories in the air; the team adjusts to life as first responders during the pandemic.

programme.desc: Stateside Premier League fan festival that includes a turf pitch, the Premier League trophy, club mascots, special guests, contests, and more.

In the aftermath of the dam break, massive mudslides wreak havoc throughout Los Angeles; Athena fights to save herself and an agoraphobic woman after her house collapses; a group of pregnant women trapped in a submerged house.

The team races to save a man under siege by his high-tech smart home; a yoga teacher loses her vision; Athena hunts down a bank robber disguised by COVID-19 protocols; members of the 118's crew prepare for an out-of-state mission.

Athena investigates a mysterious murder during a neighborhood block party; the 118 rush to save lives endangered by a bomb threat; Chimney has a hard time keeping secrets when Maddie and Buck's parents come to town.
The 118 races to save the lives of workers trapped in a factory fire; Maddie reveals a painful family secret that causes Buck to confront his childhood and answer why he is the daredevil he is today.

The 118 has a day from hell with a never-ending series of bizarre emergency calls; a man tapes himself to a freeway billboard; a restaurant manager destroys his own business; Eddie feels a spark with Christopher's former teacher.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. Explore the rich legacy of Liverpool's managerial transitions, where through decades of change, one constant endures: the club's remarkable ability to evolve and triumph, through seamless succession.

programme.desc: Caves Valley Golf Club hosts the third round of the 2025 BMW Championship. The Maryland property first hosted a PGA Tour event and the BMW in 2021, with Patrick Cantlay taking down Bryson DeChambeau after an epic six-hole playoff.

programme.title: Live: NASCAR Cup Series
programme.desc: The NASCAR Cup Series season rolls on with the Cook Out 400. Shane van Gisbergen ran his road-course win streak to four races Aug. 10 in New York, and joined Dan Gurney as the only drivers to collect their first five career victories on road courses.
